p:
A total of 21 participants swam using the remote control, henceforth called the Joystick condition, and 22 participants swam using their physical gestures, henceforth called the Gestures condition. Figure 7 shows a participant in each condition. Random assignment was indeed successful for this study as participant age [ t (41) = −0.78, p = 0.44] and gender [
χ
(
1
)
2
= 0.29, p = 0.86] were evenly distributed across conditions.
